venue.address_2: Exit 5A off Rt 128/93 in strip mall on left across from Comfort Inn
venue.name: Dunkin Donuts Randolph

item.description:
Annual Pride parade. This year we will meet up with ECBC again and ride to the meeting location in Boston.

This parade is fun, fun, fun!!!! The women bikers open the parade to the thunderous applause of the crowd!

Helmets are not required during the parade so bring a bungee or bungee net to secure your helmet to your bike while you ride in the parade.

We will also be a part of filming of a reality show for the East Coast Biker Chicks Tv show.

Come ride to support the celebration!!

Meeting location: Randolph Dunkin Donuts

Meeting Time: Meet by 8 am for riders meeting. We leave promptly at 815 am

If you want to relax and have coffee then show up earlier!! There will be more time to have coffee when we meet with ECBC in Cambridge.

Don't forget to bring rainbow flags etc if you want to decorate your bike for pride!!!

Remember to have your license and registration on your bike!!!!!!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: PRIDE Parade
